00039 void RequestHandlerAppend::run() {
00040   ResponseCallbackAppend cb(m_comm, m_event_ptr);
00041   const uint8_t *decode_ptr = m_event_ptr->payload;
00042   size_t decode_remain = m_event_ptr->payload_len;
00043 
00044   try {
00045     uint32_t fd = decode_i32(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00046     uint32_t amount = decode_i32(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00047     bool flush = decode_bool(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00048 
00049     if (decode_remain < amount)
00050       HT_THROW_INPUT_OVERRUN(decode_remain, amount);
00051 
00052     m_broker->append(&cb, fd, amount, decode_ptr, flush);
00053   }
00054   catch (Exception &e) {
00055     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00056     cb.error(e.code(), "Error handling APPEND message");
00057   }
00058 }
